channel.title: Command Line Server
channel.description: So is there a command line server? I just need to start the server through SSH on a linux machine and then MS is setup and running for me. I already have the port opened on my remote server but just need to get the server started.

item.title: Command Line Server
item.dc:creator: @WhiteNerd WhiteNerd
item.description:
@WhiteNerd wrote:

So is there a command line server? I just need to start the server through SSH on a linux machine and then MS is setup and running for me. I already have the port opened on my remote server but just need to get the server started.

Read full topic
